group_1.textCenter: (I got a message from Himena that the others are@on their way to our base.)
(No, it's not that far from Daito.)
I'm not usually the sort to get excited over@these things, butâ€”

group_1.textRight: The moment I come to meet up with you,@I find you at the scene of an accident.
Tripping over nothing...
Looks like you live up to your reputation at school.

group_1.textLeft: Jun!

group_1.textRight: Here, grab on.

group_1.textLeft: Th-thanks...

group_1.textRight: Still, I had no clue we were in the same grade.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I've never seen you around school, either.

group_1.textRight: Well, makes sense.
I've been in and out. My family moves around@a lot for work.

group_1.textLeft: So that's why I haven't seen you...
Then, do you remember where the Civic Center is?
That's where our base is...

group_1.textRight: It's a distant memory.
Is that where the Neo-Magius meeting is being@held today?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, Himena and Shigure are both on their way@there to hold a brief discussion
Although Alexandra might not be back for a while...

group_1.textRight: Someone I don't know?

group_1.textLeft: I barely know her either. Ehehehe...

group_1.textRight: Sheesh, it's dangerous to invite people in@so casually...

group_1.textLeft: I didn't have any time to make a complaint@before she made herself at home.

group_1.textRight: You're one carefree girl...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, by the way, Jun, did you go to that candy store?

group_1.textCenter: I thought I saw her again recently, but@she never stopped by.
If you happen to meet her, please@pass her a message for me.
Tell her that the two of them are always@welcome to come play here again.

group_1.textLeft: I think it was called the Tomorrow Shop?@The elderly lady was thinking about you.

group_1.textRight: No, I haven't gotten around to it yet.
I haven't seen her since I came back here...

group_1.textLeft: Why...? Are you waiting for something...?

group_1.textRight: I'm not sure...
I have a feeling I shouldn't go yet...
Like I can't approach... I feel like I'm missing@something...

group_1.textLeft: Missing something...@What could that be...?

group_1.textRight: I don't know either, but something@needs to change.
That's a condition for me to go to the@Tomorrow Shop.

group_1.textLeft: Huh...
Eeeh?!

group_1.textRight: Were you heading home? I caught you just in time.
Who's she? Do you know her?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah... She's a senior member of the drama club.@Can I help you?

group_1.textRight: Do you know where I can find the costume for@my upcoming play?

group_1.textLeft: Ohh... Hmmm...
I'm pretty sure I brought it to the storehouse@after I adjusted it to your size.

group_1.textRight: Great, just tell me where it is!@No, wait, come with me!

group_1.textLeft: Huuuh?!

group_1.textRight: The athletic department is closed today, so we can@use the gym all we want!
Sorry, girl, please lend me Hagumu for a minute!
I'd tell you it'd cost a million yen,@but it doesn't really matter to me.
I'll just hang around here.

group_1.textLeft: Well, okay, I'll be back in a bit.

group_1.textRight: I'll just knock back some Pop Rocks while I wait.

group_1.textLeft: Eeeh...?!

group_1.textRight: I'm kidding.
